transcriptAll:
23:22:22-consumer: היי אני לא יודעת אם לפנות אליכם או לא.
לפני מספר ימים עברתי משהו לא נעים, ידיד של חברה שלי שהיה אמור להקפיץ אותי לבית, הוא לקח אותי לבית שלו, כל הדרך הבהרתי שאני לא אכנס אליו לבית ושאני לא מעוניינת.
הגענו למקום הוא רצה שאכנס וטען שרק יאכל משהו ויקח אותי לבית, כל הזמן שהיינו אצלו הוא רצה שאקשיב לו, ניסה לגעת בי, לחבק אותי, אמר לי ללכת לישון ונשכב לידי מבלי שאני רוצה.
לבסוף כעסתי, דרשתי שלא יתקרב אלי ואחרי זמן ארוך מצאתי דרך לחזור לבית.
23:22:24-agent: שלום, הגעת לווטסאפ של מרכזי הסיוע לנפגעות ונפגעי תקיפה מינית
23:22:24-agent: הצ'אט שלנו בווטסאפ *לא פעיל* כעת ואין ביכולתנו לראות או לקבל את הודעתך
23:22:25-agent: שעות המענה בווטסאפ:
בימים א'-ה' ושבת בין השעות 17:00-23:00
23:22:25-agent: בתקופת החגים יהיו שינויים בשעות הפעילות:
בתאריכים 16.9.23-17.9.23 (ראש השנה)- הקו יהיה סגור
בתאריך 24.9.23 (ערב יום כיפור)- הקו יהיה סגור
בתאריך 25.9.23 (יום כיפור)- הקו יעבוד משעה 18.00-21.00
כל חול המועד (מתאריך 30.9.23 ועד 7.10.23 (לא כולל ימי שישי))- הקו יעבוד משעה 18.00-21.00
23:22:26-agent: אם הנך זקוק/ה כרגע לסיוע, ניתן לפנות ל:
✳️ קו סיוע טלפוני זמין 24/7:
 1202 מענה ע"י אישה, 
 1203 מענה ע"י גבר
 2511* תהל- סיוע לנשים וילדים דתיים  
 ✳️ צ'אט אנונימי באתר 1202kolmila.org.il בימים א'-ה' ובשבת, בין השעות 17:00-24:00
23:22:27-agent: מוזמנות ומוזמנים לפנות אלינו בשעות הפעילות
23:22:28-agent: 
23:22:34-consumer: כן
transcriptConsumer_en:
Hi, I don't know whether to contact you or not.
A few days ago I went through something unpleasant, a friend of my girlfriend who was supposed to drop me off at his house, he took me to his house, all the way I made it clear that I would not enter his house and that I was not interested.
We got to the place, he wanted me to come in and claimed that he was just going to eat something and take me home, the whole time we were at his place he wanted me to listen to him, tried to touch me, hug me, told me to go to sleep and lay next to me without me wanting to.
Finally I got angry, I demanded that he not come near me and after a long time I found a way to return to the house.
Yes

ניפגש בקאנטה בחוף דלילה (המאנקיז לשעבר) ב-21.9 יום חמישי בשעה 18:00 ❤️
בתוכנית : הרמת כוסית, נישנושים וגם נחשוב ביחד מה אנחנו רוצים שיהיה בפעילויות שלנו בהמשך השנה.

ואת הערב יסגור די-ג'יי אילוז האלוף במסיבה כיפית אל תוך הסופ״ש🤍💫

22:16:20-agent: אני לא יכולה לפתוח את הקישורים ששלחת. נשמע שאת במצוקה
22:18:24-consumer: מהתיכון מהפדופיליה בבית ספר הפגיעה הפוסט טראומה המורכבת הפרעות אכילה הפגיעות עצמיות עד האונס לפני שנתיים אז עוד ניסיון אובדני כמעט מתתי ממנו 100 כדורים אושפזתי ברזילי לא התאים לי לא היה ברירה 3 חודשים עד שאיתאזנתי קצת השירות לאומי הזה ריסק אותי הכניס לי ocd קשה
פיטרו לא בחוק אז חזרתי ואני סובלת מכבי הנבלות לא מוכנים בעיקר המנהלת איילה שרקי שהוא אחראית על עוסית במקרה הייתי באישפןז בגלל עבר איתי בגיל 19 של שתי פגישה לא ראתה שינוי בי החליטה לא מגיע לי עוסית עד שיכנס לטיפול יום ניפגעות תקיפה מינית פוסט טראומה מורכבת 
כי רק אחרי השיחרור כניראה רק ב 15.11 אני ישתחרר אז אינטקט עד אז לא יכולה לקבל טיפול ושאני מבקשת מסרבים לתת לי מרוע אומרת אישפוז סגור שהיא בכלל לא פסיכיאטרית אף פסיכיאטר לא אמר את זה 
היה שם פסיכיאטר רע באשדוד מוסע סעיד באשדוד בהתחלה נתן הפנייה לטיפול יום ניפגעות עבירה 
ואז פגישה אחרי מחק את כול האבחנות סיכם כאילו כלום עכשיו אומר שאני מחלקה סגורה מה נהיה מבריאות הנפש בישראל ?! 
קטטסטרופה 
אגב אם איילה אומרת עוסית פסיכוטרפיה זה רק מאוזנים למה באישפוז לפני שנה קיבלתי 3 פעמים בשבוע פסיכותרפיסטית זה מה שהבריא אותי גם זה הטיפול הכי טוב פוסט טראומה מורכבת זה גם הטיפול יש באישפוזים לניפגעות תקיפה מינית 
רוע רק חולי יודעים לתת לי
כול גוף מנסה לפגוע בי המטרה של המדינה זה שאני יתאבד ימות לא באמת לחפר על נזק הנפשי המיני הפגיעה רמסו אותי 
משרד החינוך משטרת ישראל עריית אשקלון ידעו על פדופיליה לא עשו כלום 
ואז שירות לאומי 
משרד הבריאות הקופת חולים 
לפני הסל שיקום לא תיפקד עכשיו הוא היסתדר 
אבל אי אפשר לשקם בלי תמיכה כי יצאתי מאיזון לגמרה לא אשמתי בגלל הגיהנום עברתי בשירות גם חוסר טיפול נפשי !!

Here is a brief history about me
!!

From high school, from pedophilia at school, the trauma, the complex post-traumatic stress disorder, eating disorders, self-harm, until the rape two years ago, then another suicide attempt. I almost died from it. I took 100 pills. I was hospitalized. It didn't suit me, I had no choice for 3 months until I balanced out a bit, this national service crushed me and gave me severe ocd
I was fired illegally, so I came back and I suffer from the scumbags who are not ready, especially the manager Ayala Sharkey, who is responsible for an ossit. Then a meeting after deleting all the diagnoses concluded as if nothing now means that I am a closed ward what will become of mental health in Israel?! 
Catastrophe

אני לא יכולה לעכל את זה העבר שלי פשוט מסכת גיהנום הלוואי שלא הייתי חיה  בשביל לא לעבור את זה שוב 
אי אפשר לתאר כמה העבר הוא הווה שלי צוות חינוכי עשה פגעו בי מינית פדופיליה שידול אובדנות פגיעה מינית היתעללות מנטאלית 
ואז לפני שנתיים עברתי אונס מהידיד שלי אחרי הרבה ניסיונות אובדנות מהתיכון רק לפני שנה כמעט מתתי 100 כדורים ציפרלקס אקמול אושפזתי במחלקה פסיכיאטרית ברזילי שלושה חודשים מנהלת מחלקה עוסית שם חשבתי שיקמו אותי שמו אותי  באישפוז בוועדה סל שיקום לקראת שיחרור הישתחררתי אחרי 10 ימים מהסל שיקום הוועדה בתאריך 10.4.22 הישתחררתי ב 19.4.22 אחד החלטות זה שירות לאומי עם ליווי שזה שקר כזב אין פה שום ליווי  והוסטל לצעירים בכלל לא מתאים לי כי אני ניפגעת עבירה לא מתאים לי מעורב  לא התאים לי מ24.4 עד 28.8 שנה שעברתי הישתחררתי מהמחלקה הפסיכיאטרית רק 19.4 שנה שעברה 
ואז חזרתי הביתה ניכנסתי לשירות לאומי הזה בלי ספק ניכנס הספק הייתי חודש בשירות לאומי עברתי היתעללות נוראית השנה גם מהשירות לאומי 
(גם היתנהגות פוגענית גם כלפי הסל שיקום שזה לא הוסיף )

וגם אבחנה ocd  אני מצטערת ניכנסתי לשירות לאומי הזה 
אני מתפרקת בצדק כי יצאתי מאיזון נפשי גם מחכה לטיפול יום שלי ועד שלא יסיים לא יכולה להתחיל טיפול זה לא דבר משקם דבר פגע בי האיזון הנפשי שלי החמיר החזיר את הפגיעות עצמיות 
אמרתי כבר בנובמבר שנה שעברה שאני לא רוצה להמשיך אמא שלי מכוונה טובה חשבה השירות יועיל לי אבל כולם שמו עלי פס גם אנשי השיקום שמו פס על התחושות שלי על זה שרציתי לסיים מזמן תשירות לעזוב לא לעשות 
הינה אני סובלת בשירות לאומי הזה עם חרדות חרא 
עם פלאשבקים היתקפי פוסט טראומה קשים 
אין ספק אני מתפרקת נפשית אני לא יכולה לסבול את זה עוד !

say my name

OK
So I'll just tell you what happened
Yesterday in the early afternoon I was alone in my house with my daughter (she is two months old and I am on maternity leave)
I ordered food from one of the apps and when the courier arrived he called and I told him to put it by the door I just have a little baby and can't open the door
After a few minutes, when the girl fell asleep, I went to open the door of the house to take the food that was waiting for me, so you understand, I am a responsible girl in Ramot, I have lived alone for 3 and a half years with my husband, and I would always look through the peephole of the door to see who was outside Because I was always told to look, you can't tell who is behind it, for a change I didn't look and when I opened it out of instinct or thought that the food must be on the floor next to the door, so I already bent down
I didn't pay attention fast enough to see that there was another person standing there
In seconds he was already inside my house
I was shocked, I didn't know what to say or do
And he comes closer to me and I start walking slowly back and suddenly in a second I freeze
He started touching me, touching my chest and butt
He grabbed my hair and held my mouth open in such a way that I couldn't resist. He lowered me to his knees and put his penis in my mouth.
It was just awful
And all that goes through my mind is, accept it, flow with him, do what he asks, don't fight It's enough because it might turn him on more so that he doesn't suddenly do something to your daughter, deal with the situation, there's nothing you can do

I'm just still in the market
After he left I vomited my soul I went to check what was happening with the girl who luckily she was sleeping and he didn't reach her
I put her next to me in her crib and went to sleep when my husband came and woke me up he saw that something had happened but didn't even think for a moment about such a situation

who's here

no yo opinion if strength but I simply know that the girl needs me and she needs me healthy, so the faster it is fixed the faster there will be good results

The statute of limitations for sexual offenses against minors will only begin on the day the minor turns 28.
The statute of limitations periods are:
In the case of a sin - one year.
In the case of a misdemeanor - five years.
In a felony - ten years.
In the case of a serious crime punishable by 7 years of imprisonment or more - 15 years.

19:07:08-consumer: תודה 🙏🏼

מדובר בחברה הכי טובה שלי. אנחנו חברות כבר בערך 15 שנים. היא בחורה מדהימה, מאוד מיוחדת - חכמה, רגישה, עמוקה, מצחיקה, אכפתית בטירוף...

היא בזוגיות כבר 9 שנים (התחילו לצאת כשהיא הייתה בת 18 והוא 20, כיום היא 28 והוא 30). לפני שנה הם התחתנו.
אני זוכרת שבערך בתחילת הקשר שלהם עלו אצלי כל מיני תהיות לגביו, פשוט כי הוא עם מזג קצת חם ואינטנסיבי כזה, ולפעמים הוא היה לא נעים, אבל הוא ממש ממש השתפר ונהיה סבלני יותר ונחמד יותר מאז, וכיום הוא גם הפך לחבר ממש טוב שלי, שאפשר לדבר איתו לעומק ולשתף אותו בדברים והוא מאוד מכיל ורגיש. והוא בכללי אדם טוב שנראה שחשוב לו לעשות טוב. על פניו, חוץ מהקשיים בהתחלה, הם נראו לי תמיד די שמחים ביחד. אני גם יודעת שהוא אוהב אותה בטירוף (כשהוא תכנן את הצעת הנישואין עזרתי לו, ויצא לי לראות את זה מקרוב). הוא כן לפעמים קצת ציני ולפעמים "מכבה" אותה, אבל לא ייחסתי לזה חשיבות חריגה.

כן שמתי לב שחודשים (אולי שנים?) האחרונות יש לה מן עננת דכדוך ממש קלה כזאת וגם קצת קושי להצליח בתואר (אבל תמיד ייחסתי את זה לזה שהיא עושה הרבה דברים במקביל - היא ספורטאית מקצוענית ועובדת במשהו בהייטק במשרה חלקית במקביל).

לפני חודשיים היא התחילה טיפול, בגלל הקשיים האלה. וכמה ימים לפני תחילת הטיפול היא שיתפה אותי (בכאב רב, היה מאוד קשה לראות אותה מדברת על זה. אף פעם לא ראיתי אותה לפני כן בכזה כאב. היא בדרך כלל מאוד חזקה נפשית, גם סביב דברים קשים) בזה שלפני כמה שנים הייתה להם תקופה קשה ואיזשהו ריחוק ביחסים שהשפיע גם על הפן המיני והייתה פעם אחת שהם שכבו למרות שהיא בהתחלה לא רצתה. היא הדגישה מלא פעמים שלא הייתה כפייה פיזית, אבל ממה שהבנתי כן הייתה שם מניפולציה רגשית כלשהי (מן עלבון על זה שהיא לא רוצה שבא לידי ביטוי בכעס שקט כזה וזה שהוא לא דיבר איתה, אז היא בסוף כן הסכימה). היא אמרה שהיא לא זוכרת הרבה מאותה פעם, חוץ מזה שזלגו לה דמעות מהעיניים ושהיא פשוט "הייתה שם".
מאז אותה פעם נהיו לה קשיים בפן המיני (היא שללה משהו רפואי). והיא סיפרה שהוא מאוד התבאס מזה. והיא אמרה שמאז, מדי פעם יש לילות שהיא מתעוררת לתוך זה שהוא נוגע בה (ואני לא יודעת אם זה משנה, אבל היא כן אמרה שהמגע עצמו כן מכוון להיות נעים בשבילה ולא רק "נצלני" בשבילו). היא אמרה שבהתחלה היא הייתה קצת בהלם מזה ולא ידעה איך להגיב ושזה גם לפעמים היה ממשיך ליחסי מין (כשהיא כבר ערה), אבל שמתישהו היא אמרה לו שזה עושה לה ממש לא טוב נפשית ושהוא אמר שהוא הבין, אבל מסתבר שגם אחרי שהיא אמרה היו לפחות עוד פעמיים שזה קרה.

היה לי ממש קשה לראות את הכאב שלה והבלבול וגם אשמה עצמית כזאת. אני מאוד אשמח לשמוע איך אני יכולה לתמוך בה במצב כזה ומה לעשות. ואני גם אשמח להבין אם זו נחשבת פגיעה מינית או שזה איזשהו שטח אפור, ובכלל מה עושים עם זה...

היא היום בטיפול כאמור (cbt), אבל אני רוצה לדעת איך אפשר לעזור לה גם. יכול להיות שיש לה גם פוסט טראומה? ואם כן, מה עושים?

תודה רבה וסליחה שזה יצא ארוך...

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
Hi Anat, thanks
I would be happy to consult about a friend who shared something ongoing that is happening to her in a relationship. Is it possible?
Thanks 
This is my best friend. We have been friends for about 15 years. She is an amazing girl, very special - smart, sensitive, deep, funny, insanely caring...
She has been in a relationship for 9 years (they started dating when she was 18 and he was 20, now she is 28 and he is 30). A year ago they got married.
I remember that around the beginning of their relationship I had all kinds of questions about him, simply because he has such a hot and intense temper, and sometimes he was unpleasant, but he really, really improved and became more patient and nicer since then, and today he has also become a really good friend of mine, that you can talk to him in depth and share things with him and he is D is inclusive and sensitive. And he is generally a good person who seems to care about doing good. On the face of it, apart from the difficulties at the beginning, they always seemed to me quite happy together. I also know that he loves her madly (when he planned the marriage proposal I helped him, and I got to see it up close). He is sometimes a bit cynical and sometimes turns her off, but I didn't attach any unusual importance to it.
Yes, I noticed that for the past few months (maybe years?) she has had such a light cloud of despondency and also a little difficulty in succeeding in the degree (but I always attributed it to the fact that she is doing many things at the same time - she is a professional athlete and works in something high-tech part-time at the same time).
Two months ago she started treatment, because of these difficulties. And a few days before the start of the treatment she shared me (with great pain, it was very difficult to see her talk about it. I have never seen her before in such pain. She is usually very mentally strong, even around difficult things) in that a few years ago they had a difficult time and some kind of distance in the relationship that also affected On the sexual side and there was one time they slept even though she didn't want to at first. She emphasized many times that there was no physical coercion, but from what I understood there was some kind of emotional manipulation (from an insult that she didn't want it expressed in such quiet anger and that he didn't talk to her, so in the end she did agree). She said she doesn't remember much about that time, other than tears welling up in her eyes and just being there.
Since that time she has had difficulties with water Ni (she ruled out anything medical). And she said that he was very upset about it. And she said that since then, occasionally there are nights when she wakes up to him touching her (and I don't know if it matters, but she did say that the touch itself is meant to be pleasant for her and not just exploitative for him). She said that at first she was a little shocked by this and didn't know how to react and that it would sometimes continue to have sex (when she was already awake), but at some point she told him that it made her feel really bad mentally and that he said he understood, but it turns out that even after she said there were at least It happened twice more.
It was really hard for me to see her pain and confusion and also such self-blame. I would be very happy to hear how I can support her in such a situation and what to do. Van I would also like to understand if this is considered sexual assault or if it is some kind of gray area, and in general what to do with it...
Today she is in treatment as mentioned (cbt), but I want to know how we can help her as well. Could she also have post-traumatic stress disorder? And if so, what do we do?
Thank you very much and sorry for being so long...
Is there anything worth noting? Is there anything you should say or better avoid saying?
What she went through is considered sexual violence?
Thanks for the help, good night
Can we just ask why it is on the gray border?

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
No problem, I'm here
Hi I wanted to consult about something I experienced in the test
I was with a cardiologist (heart) at the clinic for the first time with him.. 
(In the distant past I was tested by someone else)
And I felt bothered by him during the examination with a stethoscope
I complained about it at first by a friend and after that I told her to say it was me.. 
I was summoned for a general interrogation
But the questions finished me there and the demonstration she asked to illustrate to her exactly what was
True .. but it was beyond that .. he pressed my nipple (sorry if it's too much detail) with the stethoscope .. and I remember that it's not supposed to be like that
She asked me to physically demonstrate to her how it happened.. what did he do exactly.. 
And another question of what did you wear?
The question is whether it makes sense to ask such a question Should it matter if I wore underwear and a bra or a dress or anything else?
And illustrate what was exactly..
She also had no idea as if it is being investigated now where they are investigating to find out if it is considered harassment or not..
Yes, I told her that I don't remember and what does it matter
I know it's not OS because maybe they would treat it differently 
I know they will try to protect him rather force him 
But I know how I felt at that moment 
Something in me tells me it was wrong
Which was also the test twice with a difference of several minutes or more
Right .. 
I will receive an answer from them only in a month or two or maybe more.. 
I don't know what to expect
I'm glad I complained no matter what
Thank you very much and have a restful evening 
I just wanted to vent Some ..

לו אח בן 19 שהוא מהכפר והוא מתקשר אליי ואומר אני בעיר שלך בואי נטייל נסע והתלבטתי אם לצאת או לא אמרתי לעצמי לא לא כדיי כי לכי תדעי אבל איך שהוא יצאתי בסוף והייתי בדיכאון באותו הערב ממקרה נוסף עכשיו אני אספר עליו: לפני יומיים שזה קרה טיילתי עם בדואי אחד שהכרתי מהינטסארם דיברנו וזה סתם דיברנו לא תיכננו משהו והוא באותו הערב גם היה באיזור כי היה להם חג אז הוא החליט להגיע אז יצאתי באותו הערב טיילנו בטיילת למרות שקצת חששתי בהתחלה אם לצאת אבל ברוך השם הבן אדם טוב אז לא קרה כלום והבחור הזה היה לו רגשות אליי אבל את יודעת סתם רגשות לא עכשיו אהבה או משהו והוא רצה שאני אהיה חברה שלו לא זוגיות סתם ידידה חברה משהו כזה ואז כשכבר רציתי ללכת הביתה הוא הסיע אותי הביתה וזה לא נגמר כאן הוא לא נגע בי כלום לא הראה שום סימנים אבל איך שהוא זה נגמר ש אני כבייכול גרמתי לכל זה ולא הוא ומהצד שלי זה ממש מביך ומוזר שהייתי בחוסר מודעות מה עשיתי וזה וזה ממש הרגשה לא טובה עם עצמך וכו.. , אז באותו הערב שחזרתי הביתה באמת לקח לי זמן לעכל את המקרה הזה ובאמת נפלתי לדכאון מקרה מטריד והרגשה לא נעימה ואיך שהוא למחרת עדין המשכתי לדבר עם הבחור מהכפר וזה (אבל מההתחלה ידעתי מה הוא רוצה ) והוא התקשר אליי ספונטני והציע לי לצאת (אני חוזרת למקרה ההוא בהתחלה) אז יצאתי סיפרתי לו בטלפון לפני שיצאתי שקרה לי ככה וככה עם מישהו למרות שהוא לא הבין את זה ולא הקשיב לי בכלל אז התארגנתי מהר ויצאתי ופגשתי אותו במכונית התיישבתי … וראיתי שהוא ממש מיהר לאנשהוא ואז הוא אמר בואי נעבור למושב האחורי כדי לעשות מש הוא תיכנן אז אני לצערי הרב זרמתי אני לא יודעת למה באמת לא חשבתי כמה פעמיים ויכולתי פשוט לצאת מהמכונית ולומר אני לא מוכנה לזה אבל ומה שקרה במושב האחורי היה התמזמזות ודחף לעשות את זה אבל אני התנגדתי ופשוט לא ננתי לו הוא כן נגע בי וזה אבל לא הסכמתי לעשות את זה ובאותו הערב אח שלו היה בעיר וכשהוא פגש אותי היינו בדרך למכונית הוא התחיל לנשק אותי מול כולם ברחוב ואז הלכנו לפינה והוא ממש רצה גם לעשות איתי את זה אבל התנגדתי אז סתם הוא משך את הזמן  ובכל מקרה הסיפור מסתיים בזה שחזרתי הביתה פשוט בהרגשה הזויה למה זה קרה לי למה יצאתי למה אני גורמת לדברים כאלו לקרות שזה נטו אשמתי .. עכשיו אני סיפרתי למישהי את הסיטואציה בסטיפס ואמרתי לה שזה חס וחלילה לא היתה הכוונה אני בחיים לא יעשה יחסי מין עם ערבים סתם ככה כי אני לא שרמו*** או משהו כזה והבהרתי את זה מתי שסיפרתי כי אני לא כזאת ומה שקרה זה באמת הזיה פשוט גם הייתי בשתי transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
Hey
So this is how I wanted to tell something that happened in the last month
And I'm very upset about it, I have no one to share it with
So about a few months ago I started talking to Arabs and getting to know them, I think it was out of some kind of innocence and curiosity and at that time I fell in love with them but it's not related to the case, and in that case that happened I was talking to a boy at the time and he had a 19 year old brother who is from the village and he calls me and says I'm in your city come We went for a walk and I was debating whether to go out or not I said to myself no it's not my way because go you know but anyway I went out in the end and I was depressed that evening from another case now I will tell about it: two days ago this happened I was walking with a Bedouin I knew from Hintsaram and we talked and it was just that we talked we didn't plan anything and he in the same Tonight was too in the area because they had a holiday so he decided to come so I went out that evening we walked on the boardwalk even though I was a little worried at first whether to go out but thank God the man is good so nothing happened and this guy had feelings for me but you know just feelings not now love or something and he wanted me I will be his girlfriend, not a relationship, just a friend, a friend, something like that, and then when I wanted to go home, he drove me home and it didn't end here. He didn't touch me, didn't show any signs. And it's strange that I was unconscious of what I did and this and this is a really bad feeling about yourself, etc., so that evening when I returned home it really took me a while to digest this case And I really fell into depression, a disturbing incident and an unpleasant feeling, and whatever it was, the next day I still continued to talk to the guy from the village and this (but from the beginning I knew what he wanted) and he called me spontaneously and suggested that I go out (I go back to that case at the beginning) so I went out and told him on the phone before I left that this happened to me And that's how it is with someone even though he didn't understand it and didn't listen to me at all, so I got organized quickly and went out and met him in the car and sat down... and I saw that he was really rushing somewhere and then he said let's move to the back seat to do what he planned so I unfortunately flowed in I don't know why I really didn't I thought about it twice and I could have just gotten out of the car and said I'm not ready for this but what happened in the back seat was a buzz A and pushed to do it but I resisted and I just didn't let him he did touch me and that but I didn't agree to do it and that evening his brother was in town and when he met me we were on the way to the car he started kissing me in front of everyone on the street and then we went to the corner and he really wanted to do it too I have it with me but I resisted so he just took the time and in any case the story ends with me returning home just with a delusional feeling why did this happen to me why did I go out why do I make things like this happen it was my fault .. Now I told someone about the situation at Steeps and told her it was God forbid It was not the intention that I will never have sex with Arabs just like that because I did not cheat *** or anything like that and I made it clear when I told that I Not like that and what happened was really just a hallucination. I was also in a bad state of mind in both of these cases, so that made it even more difficult.
And after this incident I wanted to go complain to the police and I told this guy and he said do whatever you want
And since then we don't talk, I think he did realize the mistake he made and so did his brother, because you don't do things like this without finding out who, etc.
But it's still considered trauma and I don't consider it rape or anything because it was kind of with my consent but I didn't want it at the time..

As part of the manic episodes, I mainly experienced a lot of aggressiveness on his part Cold in tone of voice and choice of words. לא יודע ממש איך להתחיל אז פשוט אתאר את הסיטואציה. ישבתי על ספסל בפארק עם ספר. לפתע ניגש אליי בחור זקן על אופניים. התחיל לפתח שיחה משום מקום. יש עבודות על איזה שביל ליד הפארק והוא שאל מה בונים פה וזה. עניתי שאין לי מושג. ואז הוא שאל איזו חברה האופניים שלי (הן היו מונחות לידי). אמרתי שאין לי מושג ושהן של אבא שלי. תוך כדי השיחה אני קולט שהמכנסיים שלו מאוד מאוד קצרים ורופפים והאשך שלו ממש חשוף וכמעט בחוץ. ישר הסטתי מבט והסתכלתי קדימה. אמרתי לעצמי איזו פדיחה שכל הזה שלו בחוץ אבל לא הטריד אותי יותר מדי. ואז הוא סיפר שהאופניים שלו "קארבון" כאילו סוג יוקרתי של מתכת. ואז הוא הצביע עם האצבע על הכידון ואמר "זה קארבון" ואז הצביע על הגוף של האופניים ושוב "זה גם קארבון" ואז הוא הצביע על המוט שמתחת למושב ואמר "גם זה קארבון" כשכמובן אם הייתי מתסכל לשם הייתי מביט ישר לאיבר שלו. בדרך כלל כשאנשים מצביעים על משהו אז אתה מסתכל לעבר המשהו הזה. וכאילו שמתי לב מקודם שהזה שלו חשוף אז לא הסטתי את המבט לשם והסתכלתי קדימה ואמרתי "מגניב". ואז אחרי זה כזה אמר טוב להתראות ורכב משם. הייתי די בשוק שזה קרה. שתוך כדי השיחה אני מבין שהוא עושה את זה בכוונה. איזה עשר דקות המשכתי לשבת על הספסל וכזה לא הבנתי מה קורה איתי. לא יותר מדי מצוקה פשוט כזה "זה אשכרה קרה עכשיו". ואז התקשרתי למשטרה ואמרתי להם שהוטרדתי מינית ושזה היה לפני עשר דקות והוא כבר לא שם. אמרו לי להגיש תלונה. אז רכבתי משם לתחנת משטרה עשר דקות משם והגשתי תלונה. הסברתי לחוקר הראשוני הזה את הסיטואציה והוא מילא את התלונה וזה. אמר שזה גבולי. גם ברגע שזה קרה הבנתי שזה גבולי. זה היה כזה רחוק מהשביל בפארק אז אין ממש מצלמות באזור. וגם הוא נסע משם אז גם אם יצליחו לזהות מי זה זה יהיה מילה שלי מול שלו וגם הוא יכול לטעון שזה לא היה בכוונה ושהוא לא שם לב כי לשיחה עצמה לא היה אופי מיני. הסיבה שהתלוננתי היא שבמידה והוא יעשה את זה שוב ואיכשהו יתפסו אותו אז שיהיה להם במאגר עוד מקרה דומה ושאני אוכל לזהות אותו או שיהיה יותר משקל לראיות אם גם במקרה אחר זה יהיה מילה כנגד מילה.
זה קרה לפני איזה 4 שעות כבר אבל אני לא ממש מפסיק לחשוב על זה. לא הייתי במצוקה וגם פיזית אם הוא היה מנסה משהו בקלות הייתי מתגבר עליו (בן אדם מבוגר בכל זאת). פשוט נורא מוזר לי המתח הזה בין זה שאני מרגיש מגעיל שהוא ניצל אותי לסיפוק המיני שלו לבין שזה שאולי בכלל הוא לא התכוון ובאמת לא שם לב שהמכנסיים קצרים מדי. זה שהוא ניסה לפתח שיחה למרות שאני עונה תשובות יבשות ואז מתגאה באופניים היוקרתיות שלו למרות שלא הראיתי שום עניין וכמובן זה שהאיבר שלו חשוף לי לגמרי ושהוא שלוש פעמים אומר זה קארבון וזה קארבון ובסוף זה מצביע על האיבר שלו, כל הדברים האלה די מחזקים לי את המסקנה שזה היה בכוונה.
נורא מוזר לי הקטע הזה שאני לא הייתי במצוקה ושאם הוא היה עושה/אומר משהו בעל אופי מיני מובהק אני די בטוח שהייתי עוצר את זה ומעכב אותו עוד שתגיע משטרה. אבל עצם זה שזה מרומז ושיש סיכוי שזה בכלל לא היה בכוונה ושהוא ניצל את הambiguity של הסיטואציה לסיפוק שלו על חשבוני גורם לי לאי שקט. לא רואה את עצמי מצליח להירדם הלילה

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey,
I don't really know how to start, so I'll just describe the situation. I was sitting on a park bench with a book. Suddenly an old guy on a bicycle approached me. Started a conversation out of nowhere. There is work on some path near the park and he asked what is being built here and that. I replied that I had no idea. Then he asked which company my bike was (it was lying next to me). I said I had no idea and that they were my father's. During the conversation I realize that his pants are very, very short and loose and his testicle is really exposed and almost out. I immediately looked away and looked ahead. I told myself what a joke that his mind was out there but it didn't bother me too much. Then he said that his bike is carbon as if it were a luxury type of metal. Then he pointed his finger at the bayonet He said it's carbon and then pointed to the body of the bike and again it's also carbon and then he pointed to the bar under the seat and said it's also carbon when of course if I got frustrated there I'd look straight at his member. Usually when people point at something then you look towards that something. And as if I noticed earlier that his was exposed so I didn't look away and looked ahead and said cool. And then after that he said good bye and drove away. I was quite shocked that this happened. that during the conversation I understand that he does it on purpose. For about ten minutes I continued to sit on the bench and I did not understand what was happening to me. Not too much distress, just like that, it really happened now. Then I called the police and told them that I had been sexually harassed and that it was before me Ten minutes and he is no longer there. I was told to file a complaint. So I rode from there to a police station ten minutes away and filed a complaint. I explained the situation to this initial investigator and he filled out the complaint and that was it. Said it was borderline. Even as soon as it happened I realized it was borderline. It was so far from the path in the park so there aren't really any cameras in the area. And he drove away, so even if they manage to identify who it is, it will be my word against his, and he can also claim that it wasn't on purpose and that he didn't notice because the conversation itself had no sexual nature. The reason I complained is that if he does it again and somehow they catch him then they will have another similar case in the database and I will be able to identify him or the evidence will have more weight if there is a word against someone in this case as well her.
It happened about 4 hours ago already but I can't really stop thinking about it. I wasn't in distress and physically if he tried something easily I would have overpowered him (an adult though). It's just very strange to me this tension between the fact that I feel disgusting that he used me for his sexual satisfaction and that maybe he didn't mean to and really didn't notice that the pants were too short. The fact that he tried to start a conversation even though I give dry answers and then brags about his luxury bike even though I didn't show any interest and of course the fact that his member is completely exposed to me and that he says three times this is carbon and that is carbon and at the end he points to his member, all these things pretty much strengthen the conclusion for me That was on purpose.
Very strange to me This part that I wasn't in distress and that if he had done/said something of a distinctly sexual nature I'm pretty sure I would have stopped it and detained him until the police arrived. But the very fact that it is implied and that there is a chance that it was not intentional at all and that he took advantage of the ambiguity of the situation for his satisfaction at my expense makes me uneasy. I can't see myself falling asleep tonight
Yes
Hi, do you see the message I sent in which I described the case?
I'm a 19 year old male if you need the context

transcriptConsumer_en: Hi, my name is Jonathan. I had the chance to correspond with someone from your hotline in the past. We received a request that I wanted to consult with you about. A woman to whom a certain person, seemingly in distress, expressed a willingness to rape someone and commit suicide in a messenger correspondence. She filed an online complaint with the police anyway. I thought at the same time to refer it to you or to the Michal Sela forum. I don't know how the police act in these situations, they may not take seriously the screenshots we received (of the same conversation between the applicant and the man). Are you an address for this type of consultation?

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hi
Hi..
It's a bit difficult for me..
I was hurt for years as a child.. and after.. and mostly I tried to repress.. until an amazing woman who became my mother took me under her wing and I was able to share with her and she was for me.. Next week I also start therapy.. and it scares me so much
Both and Umm don't know how to write it
When I was a girl I was in therapy and I was sexually assaulted by the therapist.. Most of my life was stock injuries filled with people...
Yes, because I have to..
Because it's impossible anymore and it's scary
My mother will come with me to the first meetings.. and everything.. but it scares me so much
Mostly getting hurt..
Beyond that, flooding so many vulnerabilities..
Even my mother doesn't know all the hurt I've been through, it's full.. it's heavy.. a person can't really contain it.. Every time she hears about another injury from the past she is shocked.. and she is a therapist so she is a person who knows how to accommodate..
Yes, she did a comprehensive examination before we go to the first meeting.. and still..
It's scary
Can I write you something unrelated?
No.. There is no fear of mother.. I will never hurt her..
About two weeks ago I fainted (I faint chronically) and hit my head on the concrete since my left hand doesn't function.. I'm full of tests and everything but it's also killing me..
stressful
I have syncope.. which is fainting..
No, I didn't break it.. but there is a situation where I hurt a nerve in my neck..
I have crazy pain in my head and neck.
I have no feeling in my hand and I can't move it at all
Not the same family.. and no they don't use painkillers at home..
M So I moved in with this family (I now live in the building next to them) but I am with them most of the day, mainly now with my hand... so I can no longer use Advil, etc.
Only natural things are used here.. For Mom, Advil is drugs
So right now I'm lying with compresses on my head and dealing with the pain
I would break up packages of Advil.. it's really strange not to use it anymore.. there are all kinds of oils and things she prescribes that you can always apply/take
But because she doesn't know what's on my mind, so for now she's not ready for me to take anything.. until there's an answer to what it is.. why the hand isn't functioning
Ugh, she just told my brother that she's coming home late today..
Yes.. I suffer the most during my period.. but even that we were in the hospital after The hit on the head I said I didn't want painkillers and mom was really shocked lol
sometimes
I feel really bad right now it's so frustrating to feel like this.. both physically and mentally
Because sometimes I get on her nerves lol.. but that's because she loves me..
Yesterday I made myself an iced tea and when she noticed the amount of sugar in it, she just poured it into the sink
This is the main reason I came in today.
To try not to think.. and not to be afraid
Yes, I have a feeling that I'm not alone now..
Even though my sweet little brother asks every now and then if I'm in a brace... I've traumatized him
Everyone here takes care of me.. I've been with them for almost a year and I've become a housewife for everything.. which is strange
Because I never really had a family.. as if I did my biological family.. but I was hurt so much there.. I was never cared for like that.. I never loved people like that and they loved me
Really.. understand that I knew her from nowhere in an anonymous way on Facebook.. and she asked me for help many times and I refused because I didn't know who she was until it was Saboff who discouraged me from coming to them.. then her older daughter convinced me to stay to sleep and since then I have been with them..
After a long time, the apartment below them became vacant and I rented it..so I have an apartment right below them..but right now I sleep on the sofa at their place..mainly because of the hand and the fainting..she is afraid that I will sleep alone..
They do not know
26
how old did you think
I have been told this since I was 13 years old that I am mature for my age
It sounds strange but I think the vulnerability They are the ones who raised me... The first time I was hurt I was 9 years old...
It wasn't until I was 13 that I realized it..my biological family is religious..
Right after the service I left home and did everything to build myself up and I had a really good time until I was 25 when I got hurt again and fell apart.. then I met my mother..
There was a time when I tried to ask why this was happening to me.. that I hated myself so much.. that I didn't understand what was wrong with me.. as if I had been hurt by too many people, especially in childhood.. I don't have enough fingers to count them.. and for what seemed like a long time I tried to understand what I did wrong .. and there are other times I blame myself
In my mind I don't always understand in my heart.. that's something my mother always says.. that I'm not earth.. but it's hard sometimes to accept that.. a few times at my age 9 I went after the abuser that happened to me and I was hurt.. how many times I just kept silent.. how many times at the age of 10 I stayed to sleep in the house that hurt me..etc..
Mainly from the family... No one tells you that people who are supposed to love you will hurt you
Totally...ugh, I feel like I need to throw up
I threw up.. my head explodes
Lots
Yes.. water is something that I drink full...always.. I am one of those people who drink amounts of water a day
lol
Do you believe that everything that happens to us is supposed to happen to us?
I'm trying.. I so hope not to make a mistake..
I know..
If it's okay, I'd be happy because I really don't feel like being alone...but if there's a rush or something like that, I don't want to take someone else's place
And you're amazing you know
Thanks
are you here?

I spoke with Klalit about psychological treatment, and they told me on Sunday to talk to a clinic in Jerusalem that could provide me with subsidized mental health treatments.
I just have to talk about it with my husband.
I don't know if my husband will agree with me going to therapy. Because in the past I went to treatment through his parents' association and the therapist did not give me good treatment and made me feel worse after each treatment
Thanks
I just don't like sharing my life with strangers
It's strange to me that I tell my most intimate things to a therapist who sees me once a week for 45 minutes and also teaches him to detach from me emotionally
The problem is that there are times when I don't feel the need to talk and in therapy it is a commitment to come every week
Yes ...
But I think I'll try a tip And through an application on the Internet I prefer than talking face to face
No ... I don't trust them
No... I don't trust an app either...
I simply need treatment and I prefer to talk to people as little as possible because they affect me negatively
And Amlicia is a software based on artificial intelligence, even there it can be bad... but I don't know, I feel safer with Pelephone
will be able to influence, just feel safer on the cell phone
Do not know . My mental state is a bit difficult at the moment. Like I'm fine but I need to talk and talk about everything I'm going through
It's bad for me .. it's hard for me I feel really alone .... my husband is in custody because he got into a fight with the previous owner of the apartment and now there is no one to watch over me
My mother who hurt me You had sex with my father several times, you keep sending me messages
I am not in contact with her or any of the family
Yes .........
And I feel unprotected and unsafe
Yes and it's hard. How long can you be alone? I want my husband by my side
My husband's family doesn't really support either... they don't do it out of spite like my family. But it is still difficult because there is no support.
Every night I dream about the sexual abuse. It's hard to live like this
And I keep getting up in the middle of the night
I don't have a social worker
I don't trust the system
She tried to make me crazy imagining instead of taking care of my psychopathic father
It is even more difficult that it is sexual abuse
They won't believe me for something small anyway. But I went crazy, I was psychotic, just leave the whole country Oh crap, the whole country doesn't trust them in sailing
Yes ....
I need therapy yes...
There is simply no one to trust, you don't know if the one who is taking care of you really wants your best or not
I am afraid that they will try to separate me and my husband before we got married and we just started dating. Like in the supportive community we were in, they tried to separate us in the ugliest ways possible, a social worker intervened and all the psychiatrist guides all intervened to try to separate us, I told this to my husband's mother, she said it was because he uses light drugs like weed maybe because of that,
It still really scarred me from their behavior. As if he were some kind of criminal. It is true that he set fires in the country several times, small fires, but you have to remember a few things 1 . He fought the country in his own way because he believed in it at the same time that the country was acting badly 
2. He was psychotic!
I don't trust the system!
I was put in a mental hostel for two years with 70 year old adults
Because I was afraid to live alone in an apartment
While my father roams free looking for more victims
Sorry for being so nervous and angry
It just pisses me off to be home alone all day. And this situation where my husband and I don't trust anyone even more adds to the misery
My husband won't want me to go to therapy
We are both afraid of something. It makes us fight
A previous time when I went to therapy, I argued with him straight after the therapy and he didn't do anything, the therapist dumped all her nerves on him
Then I came with her nerves to him
It is useful on Mac Certain rims, it really depends on who the therapist is
Several times therapy saved me from suicide
But now that is not the case. I don't want to kill myself, I just want to treat the pain.
But without the person taking care of being a human being and trying to separate just because he hears about my husband's past
Because it is a much deeper motive.
And I know that, I'm not too smart, but I understand that those who try to separate me from him are doing it out of a bad interest
How will I find such a therapist? No, I don't trust them, I've been hurt by them too much, I don't want to...
My first nanny used to do things behind my back with my mom. The second nanny is worse than the first one. The third nanny doesn't believe me that I would be raped. The fourth nanny is nice. Do not separate me from my husband
Yes . and explain the situation to them
But it takes a long time through the assistance centers, doesn't it?
yes I'd be glad to . You must feel that it's a little difficult for me mentally right now
The problem is that each therapist comes with an ideology of his own world
I'll think about it some more. I thought I might try to treat myself with an app
Not with a therapist, but artificial intelligence which is an application
Yes, it's hard for me...

So that God forbid I don't hurt him because of everything I saw and experienced as a girl

in my mind

that is clear

to whom?

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hello,
I am contacting you because two years ago I was sexually assaulted right after I left a toxic relationship in which I also experienced humiliation and sometimes sexual exploitation.  
Until now, I didn't take care of it because I didn't know how and I was also busy with the bachelor's degree that I am now finishing. 
But in the last year I feel that what I went through is taking over and making it difficult for me to function properly. I think I'm experiencing depression.  
I went to a psychologist through the cash register and he recommended that I go to welfare to get comprehensive treatment. But I can't understand from the website how to start the process..
Yes
Yes, but I would like it to be through WhatsApp because I have no reception at home
I wrote more or less here
I feel that in the last year I can no longer bear it. I'm always down, Experiencing a deep unexplained sorrow, a feeling of emptiness and constant anxiety, and I can't stop thinking and dreaming about everything I've been through. It's hard for me to function in my studies, I only have to finish my dissertation in my degree and I can't function, think, and deal with it. And in general, I feel that I am unable to pick myself up and function even in the things of life itself, such as household chores, looking for a job, and getting pleasure out of nothing. I can't even enjoy things that used to fill me up and make me feel good. I am already helpless and do not know what to do with all this
I am currently unemployed
It sounds like the answer I get here is robotic

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
My name is Roy, I rent an apartment in a kibbutz on the Carmel beach. 
Me and a good friend (neighbor) handle requests for invasion of privacy and also attempted rape unfortunately in the kibbutz and we are just about to drive another hour to the Zichron police station to see if they handle the complaints we filed a month ago. In the evening we have a meeting with "the person in charge of harassment in the kibbutz" but I suspect that complaints are not handled properly here and the transfer of information between the parties here is really lacking. 
If there is anyone who can have a conversation with me and my friend soon, we will be happy for guidance
Yes
Thank you very much, a friend named Leahy and I are coordinating the treatment and we included one of the friends who was injured (not in breaking into her house, which is a suspicion of attempted rape like another neighbor, but in peeking into the shower of her house) and together we went to the police and found out that Groo her bag. We explained the large number of cases and demanded more comprehensive and thorough treatment because otherwise we will take the law into our hands and investigate and catch the guy. 
I scheduled another meeting for tonight, this time with the supervisor for harassment at the kibbutz and from her we will try to understand how there is a situation where she knows nothing about the recent cases and how the security coordinator and the regional policeman do not pass on information to her. something has to change. At the same time we will try to install cameras soon so that there will be evidence and that we can catch the guy and prevent more women from harming him. In total, the cases in the last two years in our neighborhood are 7 cases of peeping that we know of, of which two were when he tried to enter a girl's house in the middle of the night

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
I would be happy to consult
A friend shared with me that she suffers repeated harassment from foreign men who start with her (and sometimes touch her). Wondering what is the way for her to respond and repel them while maintaining her confidence?
Hi, yes I would appreciate some advice
We had all kinds of ideas for coping that we came up with together, but I told her that I prefer to be more confident and consult with someone who understands
She says it happens to her every day, several times a day. On the street, in the supermarket, when she is alone, when she is with friends/family. All the time
Sometimes she says she has a boyfriend or something like that and they leave her. Most of the times they bully her a lot, don't move away when she asks and even touch her
We thought that if there were other women around then to go stand with them and ask for help, or to the island Police or pepper spray
I was worried that they would hurt her more if she didn't find a precise way to respond
that if she shows more power then they will be even more powerful towards her
Yes, that is the direction
Yes, what to do, this situation sucks
Thank you very much

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
Yes
I don't really know where to start, nothing happened to me personally just now, but someone who is very close to me was severely raped
I was the first person she turned to, I heard a lot of graphic descriptions and since then I dream about it at night all the time and can't function properly because of the fear and worry for her
And as someone who has gone through such and other harassment herself in the past, it made me very sick to hear about all these things from someone who is so close to me
She is not a friend, she was my apprentice in a youth movement that I guided
So I'm kind of an authority figure for her
She is currently in another country
And her parents aren't really there to help her
I feel that a lot of responsibility falls on me and at the same time I am not able to hear the difficult things m these
I was on a video call with her five minutes after the incident happened and I saw her clothes stained with blood and I don't know what to do with all this information right now
I feel like it's heavy on me
Yes, I'm glad she felt comfortable with me and I really care for her 
On the other hand, I also worry about myself and I don't understand why of all people it should have fallen on me because I'm in a different country than her and I have no way to help her too much
I talk to her and her mother 24/7 since the accident that happened a week and a half ago
About an hour after the incident happened I was on the phone with her and her mother and I had to tell her mother what happened because she had really bad physical injuries and she had to go to the hospital
And since then her bleeding has returned and I feel As her parents are unable to manipulate the situation, they do not take her to be tested and the responsibility falls on me
I kind of see myself in this girl, if that makes sense, I think that's why the situation is hard for me to comprehend
I try to refer them for help but her parents can't handle the situation and don't give her a safe place to talk to them
She is somewhat blamed for everything that happened, that because she didn't come early and tell them that she was meeting with this guy, everything that happened happened
A few days ago she called me crying after she woke up from a nightmare
So how should I draw the line?
Between something that makes sense for me to include and something that doesn't?
I do not know
I really don't know what to do with this situation anymore
I'm not She wants to cut contact with her completely, I am anxious about her all day 
The girl is a danger to herself and has had suicidal attempts in the past
And I'm the person she feels comfortable talking to and I feel the most egotistical that I even dare to complain about it as if
I spoke to her mother on the phone yesterday and told her she needed to see a psychologist urgently, she told me she would take care of it
I'm better
Thank you

transcriptAll:
15:52:07-consumer: שלום, שמי שי.
בת הזוג שלי, לימור, בת 42, היתה קורבן להתעללות מינית מגיל 19 עד 26. התחתנה, הביאה 2 ילדים והתגרשה לפני 6 שנים. מאז בקשרים עם הרבה גברים, עם רובם מבחינתה אפלטוני אבל עם רמיזות מיניות לעתים בוטות מצידה ועם מקצתם סטוצים וקשרים של ניצול (אחד שהיה בא לאכול, לישון, לשכב, ובבוקר ללכת). היכרנו לפני 6 חודשים וכל הזמן סיפרה לי על ידידים שבאים אליה לשתות קפה. אמרה לי שזה סתם. הפריע לי אבל שתקתי כי אני אוהב אותה ולא רוצה להיפרד. לאחרונה התנהגה מוזר, הרגשתי שהיא מסתירה. חיטטתי בוואטספים שלה וגיליתי שהיא מחליפה הודעות זימה עם גבר נשוי. היא סיפרה לי עליו בעבר שהם היו בקשר לפני 3 שנים אבל 'לא היה שם כלום'. בהודעות ראיתי שהוא ביקש להיפגש למטרת מין והיא הזמינה אותו אליה. התעמתי איתה והיא אמרה שהיא ביטלה את המפגש. הודתה גם שהיא 'מכורה לגברים' לדבריה.
לדעתי התנהלותה מול גברים נגזרת מההתעללות שהיא חוותה משך זמן ארוך.
אנחנו מחפשים פורום/ סדנא/ גורם שיוכל לעזור לה. האם תוכלו לעזור לנו?

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hello, my name is Shay.
My partner, Limor, 42 years old, was a victim of sexual abuse from the age of 19 to 26. She got married, had 2 children and divorced 6 years ago. Since then she has been in relationships with many men, with most of them platonic for her but with sometimes blatant sexual innuendos on her part and with some of them stalkers and relationships of exploitation (one who would come to eat, sleep, lie down, and in the morning leave). We met 6 months ago and she kept telling me about friends coming to her for coffee. She told me it was just. It bothered me but I kept quiet because I love her and don't want to say goodbye. Recently she was behaving strangely, I felt she was hiding. I snooped on her WhatsApp and found that she was exchanging lewd messages with a married man. She told me about him before that they were in touch 3 years ago but he wasn't nothing there In the messages I saw that he asked to meet for sex and she invited him to her. I confronted her and she said she canceled the meeting. She also admitted that she is addicted to men according to her.
In my opinion, her behavior towards men is derived from the abuse she experienced for a long time.
We are looking for a forum/workshop/factor that can help her. Can you help us?
Yes
Hey
Can you call hello, my name is Shay.
My partner, Limor, 42 years old, was a victim of sexual abuse from the age of 19 to 26. She got married, had 2 children and divorced 6 years ago. Since then she has been in relationships with many men, with most of them platonic for her but with sometimes blatant sexual innuendos on her part and with some of them stalkers and relationships of exploitation (one who would come to eat, sleep, lie down, and in the morning leave). hi Reno 6 months ago and she kept telling me about friends coming to her for coffee. She told me it was just. It bothered me but I kept quiet because I love her and don't want to say goodbye. Recently she was behaving strangely, I felt she was hiding. I snooped on her WhatsApp and found that she was exchanging lewd messages with a married man. She told me about him before that they were in touch 3 years ago but there was nothing there. In the messages I saw that he asked to meet for sex and she invited him to her. I confronted her and she said she canceled the meeting. She also admitted that she is addicted to men according to her.
In my opinion, her behavior towards men is derived from the abuse she experienced for a long time.
We are looking for a forum/workshop/factor that can help her. Can you help us?
Yes

transcriptConsumer_en:
Good morning ^_^ I'm Winky Tong and I spoke with a social work student about a case of sexual assault that happened to me about four months ago and she freed me to write to you about assistance after being unsuccessful with a lawyer for sexual victims due to a lack of evidence, I would be happy to talk to you in depth about what happened If that's an option, thanks.
Yes
Hey hmm, should I send what I wrote before again or are we getting into business?
Is the assistance you can give me only criminal? Since I have tried this in the past and the conclusion I have reached is that it will not lead to a good solution for me,
Okay, I thank you, I would love to hear about meetings at an assistance center
And I think I'll feel more comfortable via text than a phone call
Ok, understood, thanks Rabbi, I'm sorry, would you like me to explain what happened?
Oh ok thanks
Um, so I guess I'll start with what happened
Just to make some sense of what went on hahahaha, so it's like I'm an art student and I finance myself financially, which has always been a problem for me and a particular frustration that I had to think about financing the next few years, and at the same time I needed a job and I signed up for a job-finding website and they called me and told me That this is work in art in clubs and decorations and that I can go to some studio in Tel Aviv and bring all my old works and materials to start working and that they will pay me for this work and inform me later if it works, so it turns out that it was not a job interview and anything The phone call I had with him was fake, and somehow he found himself giving me an answer to all the things that were supposed to be in the interview and weren't, for example another person with him lol
Then he seemed to skim through my work and I could feel that something was very suspicious but I guess out of desperation for work I didn't leave, then he started explaining about the work and from there he asked me to sit down and do an exercise that all the employees do together, then he did what he did for three hours and I really wanted someone to save me and then because I don't live in Tel Aviv I needed him to take me back home and he tried to get me in his car claiming that he just wanted to meditate and I started crying that he would just drop me off quickly 22 And he made me crazy and put on music and be like that I just wanted us to listen to music
And like that I couldn't go to the bathroom without crying because of how sore I was after it or looking in the mirror or getting dressed
And like that I couldn't work anymore either, I couldn't work with the thought of even going to a job interview especially if it was a male interviewer, and I was just so powerless and out of control, and I find myself choosing to give up whether it's conscious or not
And it's like let's say now I can barely hold down jobs but I can't afford not to work because I have to live somehow and I'm in constant anxiety of what will happen if I do get fired at a certain point just an endless circle where I return to the same point and the same as if from And haunted by the image that I am stuck in but a tough one that really happened to my physical body and soul
Yes, I was terribly disgusted to say the least, I'm sorry, I don't know how to talk about it seriously
Yes I'm just afraid to live now I guess, can't pass through specific streets anymore 
I shared this with my friend and she was the one who really really helped me and insisted that I get help and treatment and gave me validation that my parents couldn't give me, like really if I hadn't noticed how much she wanted me to be okay I probably would have fallen into bad habits again
I have always had a history with mental illness and social difficulties and the desire to be loved and understood, and I would seek to be someone desirable through self-harm with knives and And pick up synths and surround myself with a company that lowers the quality of life 
And it was only at the beginning of September that I decided that I was quitting and wanted to live, because although I am already 20 years old and no longer a child, I wanted to give myself a chance
But I guess I missed something 
I would actually be happy if I had the opportunity to talk to someone who has the ability to treat and help me, more than my friend
First of all, I really, really thank you for listening, I don't know, I guess in my eyes it's not obvious and I would love to hear treatment options
Okay, it's 50 NIS for a meeting where I can schedule how many times a week?
And that's fine, I think it's an essential amount of information
And will there be a way to help me register for these meetings or do I do it independently?
Ok In principle, I think that the first and third options are the only ones I can finance right now, and I really, really thank you for everything
Okay, you have my consent and I am in the center of the country
Tel Aviv
Thank you very much ^_^ I will continue to have a pleasant evening

מרכז אזורי המשרת את תושבי רמלה ומטרתו לתת סיוע, יעוץ וטיפול למשפחות בהן מתקיימת דינמיקה זוגית אלימה. המרכז נותן כלים לביסוס דפוסי תקשורת אסרטיביים, שליטה בכעסים, ומלווה בתהליך היציאה ממעגל האלימות. טיפול פרטני, טיפול קבוצתי נשים גברים ילדים.
מטרות המרכז
הפסקת האלימות בתוך המשפחה (כשהמוקד הוא - אלימות בין בני זוג).
הסברה ומניעה באמצעות הגברת המודעות בקרב אנשי מקצוע ובציבור - לתופעת האלימות במשפחה.
קיום סדנאות לאוכלוסייה בעיר.
השירותים המוצעים במרכז:
טיפול ישיר - עם דגש על "הערכת מסוכנות" - בתחילת התהליך, ובהמשך מתן כלים להתמודדות עם האלימות.
סיוע מיידי בשעת משבר ובניית תוכנית הגנה אישית.
יעוץ וסיוע לנפגעי ולנפגעות אלימות במשפחה.
טיפול אישי, קבוצתי ומשפחתי.
קבוצות טיפול ותמיכה לנשים, לגברים החשופים לאלימות במשפחה. קבוצת למידה שליטה בכעסים לגברים בעלי התנהגות אלימה - וקבוצות תמיכה טיפוליות - לנשים נפגעות מאלימות.
יעוץ והדרכה לשירותים הקהילתיים בתחומי הטיפול ומניעת אלימות במשפחה.
טיפול בנפגעי תקיפה מינית.

Hey
good evening
My name is Shiri
I'm reworking something that happened a long time ago
I didn't go into details, I'll tell you a part:
I opened my story following a friend who was hurt by that person, so it turned out that for a period of time I was a listening ear for her more than I really had the strength.
Thanks for the update
So I wanted to ask, but if it doesn't belong don't answer -
What do you and other women in your position do at the end of a shift?
How do you hold on after everything you hear?
(There was something non-reciprocal there, it took over six months until I explained to her that I'm not the only one who believes in her)
Lack of reciprocity is something that is appropriate in a situation like this now or like with a therapist, not something that is appropriate between friendships.
That's why I also don't feel comfortable consulting with any other company, because it doesn't belong to Shasp R someone's personal things not mine.
But therapists do have tools and a support circle, I'm not a therapeutic figure and I got into the position by mistake.
I'm good, thank you very much! Guess you're finishing a shift.
Yes, it's a speaker and she apologized nicely. But since then I've become a bit of a trigger for her, she's a bit of a trigger for me, we've drifted apart a bit and each in a different social environment.

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
I wanted to ask a question
that's a bit strange
But in the most genuine way because I'm trying to understand in terms of logic, what is considered sexual harassment? Anything related to sex/sexuality that subjectively felt unpleasant?
What I'm trying to say is that I once went through something and I'm really trying to understand whether a. It is considered'
B. The subjective feeling is the only thing?
I know that you don't need something to be 'considered' to know that it was unpleasant
But I'm trying to understand something and to understand it I go from all kinds of directions and that's a question I had
Do you have a way to know who I am? See a profile picture/the name on WhatsApp?…
OK
I will tell the truth
I would be really happy to share, but I'm scared to death that I know you... I know at least one person in an aid center... I'm a little confused about what to do
Well I'll take the risk I think... I saw that there was an anonymous chat on the site but I couldn't activate it (at least not from the phone)
ok good to hear
I'm having flashbacks following the harassment I went through a year and a half ago. The flashbacks started not long ago after, for the first time in my life, I told about an event that happened when I was little...
Basically what happened was that I was at my friend's house when we were 8-9 years old and another one from our class (whom I didn't like at all) was there
In the end, the one I didn't like forced me to sit up while she was lying on the bed and literally make movements like you do in sex and she laughed at me for not being able to and all kinds of things. In the meantime, my friend sat on the side and watched
As if nothing happened
It was just a silly game of 9-year-old girls
The problem is that I really remember everything I felt while doing it and it was a terrible feeling...
And of course now I'm shaking all over and I feel as if all the air has been taken out of my body
By the way, what scares me is that it's real
I didn't remember that until very recently
And it's just scary that it's real and true
Now this was about the third time
Very well
in that order
I'm a bit preoccupied with other matters here, so I can't let it affect me
After the first time, I started having flashbacks to a completely different event that remain to this day
This week was a really, really tough flashback and I was with my degree coordinator and she was super cute
But then she asked if anything else happened to me besides what I told her (about the other incident I have flashbacks to him) and I didn't know what to answer
Yes? No? Did it really happen? Does it really count? Is this the reason that the second major incident was not so serious and still affects me a year and a half later?
Yes, the body remembers everything...
I am sure my memory is correct
But was it really something that bothered me that much? Is that why the new thing was received so much worse?
Yes, absolutely
But I managed to forget it
as if suppressing the event itself
I only recently remembered him
Yes, it makes sense
Yes, I am being treated by a psychologist
And also, as I said, my coordinator of the degree is involved
In fact, I mainly wanted to understand if it was legitimate what I was feeling
Can things that a 9-year-old girl forced me to do affect me like this today?
:)
Thank you
A I'm glad I did it even though I was scared
It cleared up a few things in my head
A large part of what I felt was guilt and shame and fear, these are not things I felt after the second event because of the age, relationship and gender of the other party
But the fact that I feel in my body just from writing what was...
Trying to trust me
Thanks again
Thanks
Know that you made someone's day :)

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hello
Yes
Hey
I wanted to consult a little
I filed a police complaint a while ago. 
I believe that all the women who file a complaint with the police are in tension about what will happen next
Will he be indicted, will there be justice, etc
I wanted to know how to really overcome these thoughts or at least know how to deal with them
I don't want to bother the investigators and the instructor of the assistance for the criminal track, so I don't call to find out what the status of the case is... but what do we do in the meantime? The expectation and the desire for things to progress are strong and occupy the thoughts most of the time
I received assistance from Rehovot. They transferred the investigation file to Rishon Lezion, so now I have to update myself through the Tel Aviv Assistance Center
Assistance from the Tair Assistance Center
Do you know how long a treatment usually takes? shoot?
Yes, but I don't want to bother them. 
Two weeks ago, the assistance coordinator told me that the investigations would get back to me on Tuesday last week, but they haven't gotten back to me until today
Won't it make them angry and I didn't handle the case properly?
*Do not treat
Ok.. I'll try to do it tomorrow.. I hope I get answers.
I have another question about social security
I want to submit an acknowledgment from the National Insurance for what I went through.
Who do I turn to from the assistance to help me with this?
I realised
Thank you very much for the answer 
Amen! 
thank you very very much

yes, I'm sure

Yes

yes but he insisted that I stay and that he doesn't feel well and he can't stay alone I told him that I called someone else to replace me and that I had to leave
yes i tried

Ok thank you
thank you good night

ב13 ליולי 2022 ,הייתי לבד עם אבא שלי בבית, (אבא שלי עם דיכאון כבר הרבה זמן) ויצאנו למסעדת פאב שכונתית כזאת, אבא שלי שתה בירה ולא היה מפוקס
והיית מצפה שאבא שלך יגן עלייך, וזה לא קרה.
הגיע מישהו, והוא התחיל ללטף לי את היד ולנסות לגעת לי בחזה. קפאתי. באיזשהו שלב יצאנו, הגעתי הביתה, התקלחתי, ובכיתי הרבה.
הרגשתי שאני יכולה להאשים אותו על זה, ולא אותי על העובדה שקפאתי. כי מבחינתי הוא היה צריך להגן עליי. 
אבא שלי בדיכאון כבר כמה שנים, את מכתב ההתאבדות שלו מצאתי השנה ביומולדת שלי, ואמא שלי לא מטפלת בעניין כי היא אחרי סרטן עם נזק פיזי ונפשי. מצפים ממני לדאוג לשניהם ואני עושה את זה אבל זה פוגע בי. כשביקשתי מאמא טיפול פסיכולוגי, היא צחקה לי בפרצוף.
ב18 ביולי 2023 טסתי למשלחת לארצות הברית, חלק גדול ממנה היה גם להתרחק מהבית. 
היה לנו שישבת אחד במשלחת, ובחמישי לפני השישבת הגענו למחנה לילה באזור פנסילבניה, רצו שנתערבב עם האמריקאים במחנה, וחילקו את כל המחנה לזוגות, לכל זוג הביאו דף עם שאלות כדי להכיר יותר טוב.
הייתי עם מישהו שקראו לו ג׳ואל, באנו להתיישב על הדשא, התיישבתי בישיבה מזרחית ושנייה אחרי שהתיישבתי גואל נשכב עליי, שם את הראש לו על הכתף שלי, שילב ידיים ונגע לי בחזה, אמרתי לו שאני לא מרגישה בנוח, הוא לא דיבר, לא זז, הזזתי אותו. 
ולא זזתי משם. קפאתי. שוב. אבל הבעיה זה שהפעם לא היה לי מישהו להאשים מלבד עצמי. לא היה לי את מי להאשים שלא הגן עליי כי זה היה רק אני והוא.
הוא התחיל לקרוא את השאלות, הוא לא הפסיק לדבר על סקס ודברים בסגנון, הוסיף שאלות, עד שבאיזשהו שלב לקחתי את הדף. קראתי את השאלה האחרונה וברחתי משם.
 מהמשך המשלחת עד עכשיו, אני אוכלת את עצמי על הסיטואציה הזאת, יש לי לפחות התקף חרדה אחד כל יום, אני לא אוכלת, אני לא יוצאת מהמיטה, ויש עוד הרבה מסביב שפשוט מחלחל, ואני לא מצליחה לגייס את הכוחות להמשיך, אני לא מצליחה להסתכל לאבא שלי בעיניים
כל נגיעה גם אם זה מהאנשים שאני הכי אוהבת ורוצה לידי פשוט מקפיצה אותי
וזה מחרפן אותי שהתגובה כזאת חריפה הרי זה לא אירוע כזה חריף.
זה החוסר השליטה העצמית שלי וחוסר השליטה על הסיטואציה מחרפן אותי, אני לא יודעת מה להרגיש וקשה לי עם זה

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hi I would love to talk now
How are you?
Yes
My name is Elia, I am 16 years old
On July 13, 2022, I was alone with my father at home, (my father has been depressed for a long time) and we went out to a neighborhood pub restaurant, my father was drinking beer and was not in a mood
And you would expect your father to protect you, and it didn't happen.
Someone came, and he started caressing my hand and trying to touch my chest. I froze. At some point we went out, I got home, took a shower, and cried a lot.
I felt like I could blame him for that, and not me for the fact that I froze. Because for me he had to protect me. 
My father has been depressed for several years, I found his suicide note this year on my birthday, and my mother does not take care of the matter because she is after cancer with physical and mental damage . I am expected to take care of both and I do but it hurts me. When I asked my mother for psychological treatment, she laughed in my face.
On July 18, 2023, I flew on a mission to the United States, a large part of which was also to get away from home. 
We had one Shabbat in the expedition, and on the Thursday before the Shabbat we arrived at a night camp in the Pennsylvania area, they wanted us to mix with the Americans in the camp, and they divided the entire camp into pairs, each pair was brought a page with questions to get to know each other better.
I was with someone named Joel, we came to sit down on the grass, I sat down in an oriental yeshiva and a second after I sat down Goel lay down on top of me, put his head on my shoulder, put his hands together and touched my chest, I told him I didn't feel comfortable, he didn't speak, no Move, I moved it. And I didn't move from there. I froze. again. But the problem is that this time I had no one to blame but myself. I had no one to blame for not protecting me because it was just me and him.
He started reading the questions, he kept talking about sex and things like that, adding questions, until at some point I took the page. I read the last question and ran away.
 From the end of the expedition until now, I'm eating myself up over this situation, I have at least one anxiety attack every day, I don't eat, I don't get out of bed, and there's a lot more around that just seeps in, and I can't muster the strength to continue, I can't look To my father in the eyes
Every touch, even if it's one of the people I love and want next to me, just makes me jump
And it sucks To me that the reaction is so acute, it is not such an acute event.
It's my lack of self-control and the lack of control over the situation that pisses me off, I don't know what to feel and it's hard for me
And I have no one to ask for help
And I don't intend to ask my parents for psychological treatment because they laughed in my face once before
And I'm stuck in a kind of loop that I can't get out of
And I'm freaking out
Sorry for the scroll
I know and I still can't come to terms with the fact that I froze. And I also can't understand why I can't say to myself what I say to others, I'm known in my school as someone who comes to hug her and I always know what to say but I just can't right now
It frustrates me that it affects me like this
This is true Yes
And she told me that I would sit at her place and that I would talk to her until she received instructions on what to do
And I chased her every day for a month during which I felt that my mental state was getting worse
Then when I got to her office before I could say a word she told me that I was failing and that I was stuck in a master class and I stopped going to her 
And the matter stopped
There is a teacher at school who does support me 
But we are now on vacation and she is not available
It is indeed very frustrating

transcriptConsumer_en:
Hey
I was on a friends phone today and they had a sticker that the person who raped me sent me when we were in contact and I can't stop thinking about it
I know it sounds really dumb but it made me really sick
I'm really scared now he still remembers where I live
Right
It just popped into my head again after I managed to not think about it for a bit
I try and I tried to think of other things but my whole head is full of flashbacks
I talked about it once with my psychologist but it didn't help that much. I usually try to distract myself with a series and be with my rabbit, but I didn't take him with me to Tel Aviv today and I'm still not home
Yes, but also a bit scary, I'm not used to being so far from home at these hours
Yes
Thank you, Good night

21:14:33-consumer: פשוט שאלה.. איך בדיוק מצליחים להתמודד מול המון תקיפות מיניות? איך מצליחים להתגבר על הכאב הזה כאילו והגוף שלך מחולל.. להיות הנאהבת של עצמך כשזה עומד ממול
21:14:36-agent: שלום, הגעת לווטסאפ של מרכזי הסיוע לנפגעות ונפגעי תקיפה מינית
21:14:36-agent: סייעת תשוחח איתך בקרוב
21:16:26-agent: נשמע שאת מתמודדת עם קושי גדול
21:17:10-consumer: כן האמת היא שצפיתי משפט שכזה
21:21:41-agent: אני דוקא לא ציפיתי למה שכתבת בסוף. מה הכוונה להיות הנאהבת של עצמך
21:28:16-consumer: האמת שלא יודעת אפילו מה עלה לי ששלחתי הודעה, הכל בגדר המשעשע בשבילי, ולפעמים יש לנו את הצורך הזה סתם ליפול על אדם כמו שנופלים עלינו במשך החיים רק ההבדל הוא ליפול על אדם שאנחנו לא מכירים אפילו ואולי לשמוע משפט שאנחנו רוצים, סתם תקווה שטותית. החיים שלי תמיד היו בלאגן אחד גדול וככה התרגלתי לחיות מהילדות🤷🏼‍♀️ והלוואי שהייתי נופלת ליהיה בסדר הזה שגורם להרבה את ההרגשה הקסומה הזאת שהיא בסך הכל אשליה כזאת או אחרת. הכוונה בלהיות נאהבת של עצמך זה לחזר אחר עצמך, לפרגן, להרים, להתאהב לאהוב לקבל ועוד. בגוף שלי נגעו המון עקב הניראות המקוללת שלי וחוסר ידע עקב חוסר אדם בריא כלשהו בחיי. והאמת? שלפעמים קשה? לפעמים מגיעות הנפילות האלה למרות כל הזיוני שכל ברשותך סלחי לי על המילה ״את חזקה״ ״מה שאת עברת״ ״איך את ככה נורמלית״. אני נלחמת מול עצמי יום ויום וזאת התשובה וכמה זה קל ליפול ברגע כמה זה קל פשוט להישאב לתוך הסוף העצוב שאמור להיות לי.
21:35:56-agent: אני ממש מבינה את הרצון לשמוע משהו שונה. את נשמעת לי מאד צינית ונשמע שאת לא מאמינה שאפשר לעשות שינוי.
21:43:28-consumer: האמת היא שאפשרי, עד כה עשיתי המון שינויים בעצמי לבד, ומפיהם של פסיכולוגים שאני לא מחבבת אותם האמת שברתי חוקים שלא ניראים להם הגיונים, על פי הספר שלהם הסיפור שלי אמור להתבטא בהתנהגות שונה לחלוטין מאיך שהיא היום וזה מה שמתיש, להיות ה״בוגרת״ הזאת שנלחמת בכל מעשה שיכול להרוס אותי, להיות ה״בוגרת״ הזאת שמנסה למלא את עצמה בכלים הנכונים בלהיות האדם שאני הייתי רוצה להיות ולא האדם שהעבר שלי עיצב להיות.
21:47:51-consumer: כמה שינויים אפשר כבר לעשות, כמה כאב אפשר כבר להכיל, כמה אפשר לייצג את המילה ״שרדנית״ המילה המעצבנת הזאת שמסכמת את כל כולי.
21:48:02-agent: אז את שוחה למרחקים ארוכים ונגד הזרם. נשמע לא פשוט ומאתגר
21:49:19-agent: שינוי זה תמיד תהליך.
21:58:21-consumer: צודקת וכך גם דעתי ומילותיי לכל מי שאי פעם היה צריך את עזרתי ששינוי הוא תהליך והתהליך הוא עבודה והעבודה היא רצון ומאמץ. 
האמת היא ששמעתי המון סיפורים בחיי, תמיד הייתי הפסיכולוגית בחבורה הפסיכולוגית החברה. כמה שזה משעשע המשפט לפסיכולוג דרוש פסיכולוג ולי היה קשה לממש את זה כי בסופו של דבר הרצון העז הזה שיבינו כמו שאני מבינה ומרגישה סיפורים של אחרים לא קיבל את הההבנה התואמת וזה בסדר בסך הכל, אנחנו כביכול לא מבינים במאה האחוזים או אפילו קרוב סיפור של אחר ואצלי העזרה שלי הייתה מתחלקת לשתיים, צד אחד בי שמח לראות את האדם פורח הולך בשמחה מימני והצד השני מקנא שאף אחד לא מצליח לגרום לי להרגיש כך.
22:02:13-consumer: לפעמים מטמטם אותי היקום הזה, האשמה הזאת שיכולה לאכול אותך על זה שלא היה לך שום אדם בוגר שישמור עלייך או לפחות יסביר לך על כל הסכנות שקיימות וכן כן זאת לא אשמתי אני יודעת
22:02:20-agent: תובנות כל כך עמוקות ונכונות. זכו אילו שהצלחת לעזור להם. נכון לקנא כי זה מדרבן להמשיך ולמצוא את זה שיגרום לך להרגיש כך
22:06:46-agent: שוב מסכימה איתך. גם ילדים שגדלים מסביבה נורמטיבית לא תמיד זוכים להסבר על הסכנות שקיימות. יש בעיה ממש גדולה בנושא הזה. וברור שאצלך המצב היה קיצוני
22:12:33-consumer: זה כבר לא יקרה בכל מקרה הלכו הניסיונות שלי בלחפש את המקום הזה
22:13:32-consumer: נכון.
22:15:17-agent: נשמע שאת כבר רחוק משם. את לא סומכת על אחרים ומלמדת את עצמך
22:17:00-agent: מצד שני כמו שאמרת צריך למצוא את האדם הנכון שכן יוכל לסייע לך לעזור לעצמך
22:24:43-consumer: אפילו דמות משפחתית אחת אין לי. לחפש את זה באנשים זרים בכלל קשה והאמת היא שניסיתי יותר מידי. 
האמת היא שלצערי האמון שלי נשבר כבר בסביבות גיל ה12,המחייה לצד החוסר אמון בא איתי עד עכשיו כשאני כבר בת 23, הוא נפתח קצת בפני אדם אחד והוא בת זוגתי כבר שנתיים, אדם מדהים, זוגיות בריאה. הטירלול הוא להגיע למערכת יחסים בריאה אחרי מערכות יחסים רעילות ומתעללות וכמובן שלא רק זה אלא כל המזוודה הענקית שאיתה אני בכלל מגיעה. בחיי אין אנשים קרובים, זה נע בין להרגיש את החוסר לדמות משפחתית או קירבה כזאת לבין להרגיש שאני פשוט נופלת על אדם אחד וכמובן שזה על קצה המזלג כשיש עוד המון תחושות שמעורבות בתוך זה. 
קצת איבדתי את זה עצמי כרגע במחשבות.
22:26:33-consumer: שונאת את הרגעים שבהם אני לא מצליחה להבין מה כואב לי יותר על מה לשים את האצבע את מה להסביר או להמחיש ובכלל.. למה הניסיון הזה להסביר.. כשככה או ככה הוא לא ישנה הרבה ובכלל מה אני עושה עכשיו כאן
22:29:33-consumer: תמיד סיקרן אותי מה הם הגבולות שלי, לשים קץ לחיים שלי הייתי קרובה כמה פעמים בחיי, ועדיין נשארתי להילחם כנראה בגלל הילדה הקטנה הזאת בתוכי שרוצה להילחם על חייה. לקח לי המון זמן בחיי לדעת לפנות לעזרה, והאמת היא שאף פעם לא עלה בדעתי שזה יגיע לזה שבלי לחשוב פעמיים אשלח הודעה למרכז סיוע שאפילו לא זוכרת איך הגעתי אליו.
22:29:53-agent: לא רוצה שישמע קלישאה אבל נשמע שאת אישה אמיצה שעושה המון ומצליחה להרים את עצמך. נכון שיש נפילות וזה קשה. ממש שמחה לשמוע שיש לך זוגיות בריאה וטובה
