transcriptConsumer_en:
Just a question.. How exactly do you manage to deal with a lot of sexual assaults? How do you manage to overcome this pain as if your body is a generator.. to be your own lover when it is standing in front of you
Yes, the truth is that I watched such a trial
The truth is that I don't even know what occurred to me that I sent a message, it's all in the scope of entertainment for me, and sometimes we have this need to just fall for a person as we fall for ourselves throughout life, the only difference is to fall for a person we don't even know and maybe hear a sentence that we want, just a silly hope. My life has always been one big mess and that's how I got used to living since childhood and I wish I could fall into this order that causes many people this magical feeling which is just an illusion in one way or another. The meaning of being To be loved by yourself is to court yourself, to favor, to lift, to fall in love to love to receive and more. My body was touched by many due to my cursed appearance and lack of knowledge due to the lack of any healthy person in my life. And the truth? that sometimes it's hard? Sometimes these falls come despite all the fucking mind you have. Forgive me for the word "you're strong" "what you've been through" "how are you so normal". I fight against myself every day and this is the answer and how easy it is to fall in the moment how easy it is to simply be sucked into the sad end that should be for me.
The truth is that it is possible, so far I have made a lot of changes in myself on my own, and from the mouths of psychologists whom I do not like, the truth is that I have broken rules that do not seem logical to them, according to their book my story should be expressed in a completely different behavior than mine From how she is today and that's what's exhausting, being this "adult" who fights every act that can destroy me, being this "adult" who tries to fill herself with the right tools to be the person I would like to be and not the person my past shaped me to be.
How many changes can already be made, how much pain can already be contained, how much can be represented by the word "survivor" this annoying word that sums up all of me.
You are right and so is my opinion and my words to anyone who has ever needed my help that change is a process and the process is work and work is desire and effort. 
The truth is that I have heard a lot of stories in my life, I was always the psychologist in the social psychology group. As amusing as it is, the trial for a psychologist requires a psychologist and it was difficult for me to realize it because In the end, this strong desire to be understood the way I understand and feel the stories of others did not receive the corresponding understanding and that's fine overall, we supposedly do not understand another's story 100 percent or even close and with me my help would be divided into two, one side of me was happy to see the person Porah walks happily by my side and the other side is jealous that no one can make me feel that way.
Sometimes this universe fools me, this guilt that can eat you up because you didn't have any adult to watch over you or at least explain to you about all the dangers that exist and yes, it's not my fault, I know
It won't happen anymore anyway my attempts to find this place went
Right.
I don't even have a single family figure. look for it in Strangers in general are difficult and the truth is that I tried too much. 
The truth is that unfortunately my trust was broken already around the age of 12, the revitalization alongside the lack of trust came with me until now when I'm already 23, he opened up a little to one person and he's been my partner for two years, an amazing person, a healthy relationship. The trick is to reach a healthy relationship after toxic and abusive relationships and of course not only that but the whole huge suitcase I come with. There are no close people in my life, it ranges from feeling the lack of a family figure or such closeness to feeling that I just fall for one person and of course it's on the edge when there are a lot of other feelings involved in it. 
I kind of lost it myself right now in my thoughts.
I hate the moments when They are, I can't understand what hurts me more, what to put my finger on, what to explain or illustrate and in general.. why this attempt to explain.. either way it won't change much and in general what am I doing here now
I've always been intrigued by what my limits are, to end my life I was close several times in my life, and I still stayed to fight probably because of this little girl inside me who wants to fight for her life. It took me a long time in my life to know how to ask for help, and the truth is that it never occurred to me that it would get to the point where, without thinking twice, I would send a message to an assistance center that I don't even remember how I got to.

transcriptAll:
14:27:27-consumer: Dear all hi 

Good day 

I prefer to write in English because its s easier for me to explain than in Hebrew. 

I am a little lost and confused and I need some help

My name is Miri,  I met a guy in January and we had a good feeling ( discussion, hobbies, etc ) 

It took 3 weeks till we meet and at the first date, I felt that we had a good attraction between us. We drank a coffee and he dropped me at home only but from the first appointment I felt that he wanted more but I stopped him , telling it is too soon and I am not this kind of woman and I mentioned from the beginning I want a serious relationship. The problem is that due to his job ( a position in the Defense forces ( we were not able to meet a lot, maybe once a month, but lots of messages and phone calls. The truth is that it was very difficult to combine relationships with those conditions but wanted to take a change and try. 

We wrote lots of messages and sometimes I felt he was so frustrated that he wrote me some very hot messages, that I am not used to but I said to myself its s because his far and works nights and days .. I  always was empathic with him and tried to understand all the time. 

So from January, we met once per month till May. After he tried to be more distant telling lots of work, and very busy but all the time he messaged me there were some sexually suggestive sentences … all the time trying to light the relationship. 

To be honest we never had sexual relationships, all the time we met it was kisses, some caress, and foreplay. 

However each time he became more and more demanding and sometimes showing some violence in the written messages and speaking ( like Sado maso connotation ) I was naive, I thought it was only words like a play game …. 

We did not meet since May and we did not in contact a lot till mid June. Just some messages, a few phone calls and that is all but I felt that he wanted to meet me again soon especially because my birthday is in July. 

Since me birthday dates and wished we started to speak more by phone and messages, but lots were late in the night due to his job ( he does not have a normal shift like us during everyday life ) .. 

Yesterday he called me very early at 6h30 am, telling me he wants to meet me as he was on the road to the north and he could stop to Tel Aviv. 

I said I do not want I am still sleeping it is early and I am tired, but he insisted because we did not meet a lot since May and i feel he was very very stubborn. He told me I just come a few minutes to say hello and happy birthday and I go 

I had a small worry inside me but I thought, I finally I know him and he was correct all the time even now I know he is a manipulator and it seemed to work on me ..A kind of narcissistic pervert  addict to sex ( but violent and aggressive sex) 



Finally, he came yesterday and called me to open the door.  ( I have an intercom )  but my neighbor at the same time went to work and she opened the door before I did .. 

He entered my home. And I just finished closing the door he kissed me aggressively and he carded me at the wall, and started to touch my chest…  I was in shock and I told him to stop it .. he did not listen to me .. and pushed me in the living room onto the sofa, and told me to sit down. 

At the same time, he called me a “ bitch “ and slapped me strongly … I cried because it hurt me .. I told him to stop and said, shut up. I want you to do a blow job …… now, and he grabbed my hair and my head till his sex and tell me to do a fellation. I cannot move he is very strong with more strength than me .. he approached my head near and I had to do it, he pushed it deeply on my throat, pushing on my head and pulling my hair ( I have long hair ) .. I cannot breathe and I could stop for a moment and he slapped me again …. He wanted to come in my mouth .and he climbed on me on top of the sofa to approach my mouth and to penetrate in my mouth, more strongly, aggressively, and deeply till the end ….. 



I felt humiliated, disappointed, lost … 

He finished, and said goodbye and went ……….



I did not realize yesterday about the fact, today I tried to understand how I felt bad, dirty, and also naive as I could believe him since the beginning, but the only goal was to be a sexual object ….



I could speak only to my sister about it but not in detail I wrote now .. she said it is sexual harassment and sexual attack … 

The fact I wrote it helped me because I have been suffering from chronic anxiety and I have a treatment for it this kind of fact could have bad consequences on my health. 



Thank you for listening and reading me. I needed it. 

I have to forget this nightmare. I do not know how but will succeed because I have to. 

Miri

transcriptConsumer_en:
Dear all hi 
Good day 
I prefer to write in English because its easier for me to explain than in Hebrew. 
I am a little lost and confused and I need some help
My name is Miri, I met a guy in January and we had a good feeling (discussion, hobbies, etc) 
It took 3 weeks until we met and on the first date, I felt that we had a good attraction between us. We drank a coffee and he dropped me at home only but from the first appointment I felt that he wanted more but I stopped him, telling it is too soon and I am not this kind of woman and I mentioned from the beginning I want a serious relation nship. The problem is that due to his job (a position in the Defense forces (we were not able to meet a lot, maybe once a month, but lots of messages and phone calls. The truth is that it was very difficult to combine relationships with those conditions but wanted to take a change and try. 
We wrote lots of messages and sometimes I felt he was so frustrated that he wrote me some very hot messages, that I am not used to but I said to myself its s because his far and works nights and days .. I always was empathic with him and tried to understand all the time. 
So from January, we meet once a year month until May. After he tried to be more distant telling lots of work, and very busy but all the time he messaged me there were some sexually suggestive sentences... all the time trying to light the relationship. 
To be honest we never had sexual relationships, all the time we met it was kisses, some caresses, and foreplay. 
However each time he became more and more demanding and sometimes showing some violence in the written messages and speaking (like Sado maso connotation) I was naive, I thought it was only words like a play game.... 
We did not meet since May and we did not contact a lo t till mid June. Just some messages, a few phone calls and that's all but I felt that he wanted to meet me again soon especially because my birthday is in July. 
Since me birthday dates and wished we started to speak more by phone and messages, but lots were late in the night due to his job (he does not have a normal shift like us during everyday life) .. 
Yesterday he called me very early at 6:30 am, telling me he wanted to meet me as he was on the road to the north and he could stop at Tel Aviv. 
I said I don't want I am still sleeping it is early and I am tired, but he insisted because w e did not meet a lot since May and i feel he was very very stubborn. He told me I just come a few minutes to say hello and happy birthday and I go 
I had a small worry inside me but I thought, I finally know him and he was correct all the time even now I know he is a manipulator and it seemed to work on me ..A kind of narcissistic pervert addicted to sex (but violent and aggressive sex) 
Finally, he came yesterday and called me to open the door.  (I have an intercom) but my neighbor at the same time went to work and she opened the door before I did.. 
He entered my home. And I just finished hed closing the door he kissed me aggressively and he carded me at the wall, and started to touch my chest... I was in shock and I told him to stop it .. he did not listen to me .. and pushed me in the living room onto the sofa, and told me to sit down. 
At the same time, he called me a "bitch" and slapped me strongly... I cried because it hurt me... I told him to stop and said, shut up. I want you to do a blow job …… now, and he grabbed my hair and my head till his sex and told me to do a fellation. I cannot move he is very strong with more strength than me .. he approached my head near and I had to do it, he pushed it deeply on my throat, pushing on my head and pulling my hair (I have long hair) .. I cannot breathe and I could stop for a moment and he slapped me again .... He wanted to come in my mouth .and he climbed on me on top of the sofa to approach my mouth and to penetrate in my mouth, more strongly, aggressively, and deeply till the end ….. 
I felt humiliated, disappointed, lost... 
He finished, and said goodbye and went ……….
I did not realize yesterday about the fact, today I tried to understand how I felt bad, dirty, and also naive as I could believe him since the beginning ing, but the only goal was to be a sexual object....
I could speak only to my sister about it but not in detail I wrote now .. she said it is sexual harassment and sexual attack... 
The fact I wrote it helped me because I have been suffering from chronic anxiety and I have a treatment for it this kind of fact could have bad consequences on my health. 
Thank you for listening and reading me. I needed it. 
I have to forget this nightmare. I do not know how but will succeed because I have to. 
Miri
